categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Indiko was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer in the service of the Galactic Empire during 4 ABY.

The Indiko was active on the frontlines of the war mere weeks before the Battle of Endor. The only thing known about it is the fact that it, alongside the Star Destroyer Darkk, were sent to collect Tan Maarek Stele after he defended Emperor Palpatine's personal yacht from a failed assault launched by Imperial traitor Grand Admiral Demetrius Zaarin.
